labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: I can't video chat, webcam does not show up as a camera in voice & video settings. It does however show up as a mic, and also works in the browser version of discord just fine
data.short_description: Logitech C170 webcam detected for video chat in browser version but not in desktop
data.steps_to_repro: - own a Logitech C170 (also seen it reported with a C270) - try to video chat
